name: _REWIND_
description:
(Made in collaboration with Supernova1114)

REWIND is a simple FPS shooter with one goal. Get the gun and kill all the enemies. Your movements are recorded, so be smart.

Style inspired by Superhot. :3 

Used LPFP for gun model and FPS controller with gun.
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/low-poly-fps-pack-free-sample-144839 Scripts were heavily modified.
